title: Why hasn't Obama ended the trade embargo on Cuba? - Quora
tags: Foreign Policy of the United States of America

response.answer_text: The fervent Democratic hope that they will be able to "win" Florida in 2012. Ending the embargo would largely lose the Cuban vote in FLA. Not that Floridians of Cuban descent would be likely to vote for Obama.A general (and rather odd) disregard of the Caribbean (other than Haiti), Central America and South America (besides Brazil) by the Obama Administration. UPDATE to this 2011 answer: The Obama Administration has significantly eased the trade embargo between the United States and Cuba in 2015. While the embargo hasn't been completely lifted, it has been relaxed to the point where its ultimate end will become a reality in the near future.
